titleStmt.title: A briefe discourse of the Spanish state vvith a dialogue annexed intituled Philobasilis.
titleStmt.author: Daunce, Edward.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Richard Field dwelling in the Blacke-Friers neere Ludgate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
